snippet: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Tuesday’s selections include the shutdown of an influential legal blog over concerns of government surveillance and insecure communications. Plus, are viral videos of...
abstract: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Tuesday’s selections include the shutdown of an influential legal blog over concerns of government surveillance and insecure communications. Plus, are viral videos of cute animals fueling a black market for them?

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Law Blog Shuts Down Over Government Surveillance
